dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1861 PCS: To prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To prohibit Federal funding of Planned Parenthood Federation of America.

section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be made available to Planned Parenthood Federation of America, or to any of its affiliates.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
